name: Take Me Away Skincare Travel Essentials Set
about: What it is:An exclusive holiday set featuring three bestselling, high-performance skincare products perfect for long weekends and holiday getaways..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Dark Circles.Highlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin C and Tranexamic Acid 3%: Visibly brighten under-eyes and reduce hyperpigmentation..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This award-winning, high-performance skincare routine includes a gentle foaming cleaner, a visibly brightening eye cream, and a luxe moisturizer with a potent, visibly youth-promoting formula. Together, this perfectly portable trio leaves skin looking brighter, plumper, and more hydratedu2014wherever your travels take you..This Set Contains:- 0.5 oz/ 15 mL Extreme Cream Anti-Aging, Firming, & Lifting Moisturizer.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Vitamin C and Tranexamic Acid 3%: Visibly brighten under-eyes and reduce hyperpigmentation..-Plant-Based Retinol Alternative: Visibly firms and smooths deep wrinkles..-Three Ceramides: how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Follow this routine daily, AM and PM...Keep It Clean Hydrating Gel Cleanser with Ceramides & 10 Amino Acids:.-Apply to a dry face using dry hands. .-Massage thoroughly and rinse with warm water...Bright & Tight Dark Circle Firming Eye Cream with Vitamin C & Peptides:.-Apply half a pump around each eye and gently massage in...Extreme Cream Anti-Aging, Firming, & Lifting Moisturizer:.-Apply a thin layer on clean skin, all over your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love all these products and this is a great deal for travel sizes! The cleanser is truly non stripping, hydrating, but cleans effectively.  The moisturizer is sooo nourishing but not greasy or heavy.  The eye cream really helps with plumping and fine lines and has a tint and reflect to it to brighten any darkness. And all are totally free of pore cloggers! <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Bright & Tight and thought this would be a great opportunity to try their other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The cream is very thick and smells like sunscreen. It did not absorb into my dry skin very well and made me break out. The eye cream has a bit of a sparkle or sheen to it and my eyes became very irritated. Unfortunately, I had to return the set.

reviews.review_title: Shady packaging.  Canu2019t trust a brand like this.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow.  This brand just lost me as a customer when I noticed that after use about twice a week after a few weeks, the bottle was empty.  I noticed a smaller plastic bottle inside a large glass one.  Shady!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Since I fell in love with the Innbeauty moisturizer with spf, I decided to try these other products from the brand. This set is a great way to try them out. I was not disappointed with the products. The moisturizer is rich, but absorbs well and does seem to give a bit of tightening and lift. The eye cream is good and has a little tint. The gell cleanser also is great at breaking up makeup and the size is perfect for travel. The only critique I have for Innbeauty is about the container.  So although the quantity of product is perfect for travel, the bottle that holds it is too large and heavy - when you open it, the refillable insert takes up only half of the space. It seems so unnecessary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This set is a good way to try these product. Packaging is great but the products themselves are just ok. Really nothing special. The eye cream has a good tint to it. I personally did not like the face cream or the wash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm shocked this set has good reviews. The moisturizer has the strangest texture I've ever encountered - like a difficult to spread crisco that becomes a liquid and then doesn't hydrate whatsoever.   The eye cream is fine (though also not hydrating) and the cleanser is a typical gel cleanser. I bought this kit because I heard the moisturizer was a dupe for a high end product (which I have admittedly never tried) but omg it's so bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a cute way to try these. the moisturizer is great. Definitely recommend if you would like to try their products.  I rarely stray from my cerave night cream but this moisturizer is awesome.
